casebody.data:
Robert Baxter, Respondent v. George C. Richardson, et al., Appellants. Decided May 7, 1888. Appeal by defendant from judgment entered upon verdict of jury. James M. Smith, for appellants. Edward C. James, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and O’Gorman, J.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
